observations.observation: Token velocity holds at 0.715x with acceleration at exactly 1.0x — the ninth consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x acceleration. Velocity is 7.8% above the plateau floor (0.663x) but acceleration has returned to exactly 1.0x, suggesting the break is consolidating without further upward pressure this window.

6 new CBSAs appeared this snapshot (Maine non-metro, 29820, Nevada non-metro, 33460, 33100, 11700), bringing active metros to 22 and geo-diffusion rate to 27.3%. This is the second 6-CBSA burst in the sequence — the pulse pattern now reads 3→6→0→0→0→1→9→0→0→0→6, with each major burst matching or exceeding the prior one. Non-metro state designations continue to appear alongside CBSAs, confirming rural penetration is running in parallel with metro expansion.

Token velocity holds at 0.715x with acceleration at exactly 1.0x — the ninth consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x after the six-snapshot plateau. 7d GMV ticked up $297 ($32,204 → $32,502) with 2 new receipts. The break from plateau is consolidating but deceleration signal (acceleration returning to 1.0x from 1.009x) warrants watching.

1 new CBSA (35840) appeared this snapshot, bringing active metros to 23. The burst-then-silence pattern continues — after the 9-CBSA and 6-CBSA bursts, the trickle cadence is holding. Sequence now reads 3→6→0→0→0→1→9→0→0→0→6→1→1.

Active wallets ticked from 131 to 132 this snapshot — a new participant entered the network. Total receipts now 3,534 at $205,364 GMV. Settlement remains quiet (0 new payouts this window), but the wallet count increment confirms organic onboarding continues between geo-diffusion pulses.

Zero new CBSAs this snapshot — active metro count holds at 21. After the 9-CBSA burst and 6-CBSA burst, the pulse has gone fully quiet again. The burst-then-silence pattern continues; the next burst, when it comes, should exceed 9 based on the escalating amplitude sequence (3→6→9→?).

Token velocity ticked up to 0.715x (from 0.713x) with acceleration at 1.003x — the eighth consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x acceleration. Velocity is now 7.8% above the plateau floor (0.663x), with 2 new receipts this window and 14d GMV up $297. The break is consolidating slowly but consistently.

5 vendor requests (Notion, Render, Vercel, DigitalOcean, Hetzner) have been pending since 2026-02-27 — now 3+ days with zero activations. FrontierDemand exists but FrontierActivation is zero. The review pipeline appears to have a manual bottleneck or the requests are queued without a trigger to process them.

2 new CBSAs (non-metro US-TX and US-MI) appeared this snapshot, bringing active metros to 21 and geo-diffusion rate to 9.5%. After the 9-CBSA burst and 6-CBSA burst, the pulse has returned to a quieter cadence — consistent with the burst-then-silence-then-trickle pattern. Non-metro areas are now entering the signal window, suggesting diffusion is reaching beyond major metro clusters.

Token velocity ticked up to 0.713x (from 0.707x) with acceleration holding at 1.009x — the seventh consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x acceleration. Velocity is now 7.5% above the plateau floor (0.663x), with 4 new receipts this window and 7d GMV up $371. The break is consolidating with slow but consistent upward pressure.
